summary: This document is an email chain forwarding information about a potential witness, Steven Goldfarb, who contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The email is forwarded to the FBI for addition to their spreadsheet and follow-up.

persons.name: Steven Goldfarb
persons.context: An individual who contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Potential Witness Contact
events.description: An individual named Steven Goldfarb contacts the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A potential witness named Steven Goldfarb contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The information was forwarded to the FBI for addition to their spreadsheet and follow-up.
The contact occurred on or before July 9, 2019, as indicated by the email date.
